headline: Yesterday’s Bread Is Today’s Lush Fatteh
abstract: Leftover pita is never a waste: Yotam Ottolenghi puts it to work layered amid chickpeas, tahini, herbs and chile oil.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — In the process of making sure that bread, one of the most popular but also most perishable staples, doesn’t end up in the trash heap, cuisines the world over have used every tool at their disposal to find delicious recycling options.
